subject: Haptic shakers order.
description_text:
I ordered 2 shaker combo on Dec 26th. I was told they would arrive by
today. I just now received an update saying they were left behind in the
warehouse and it would be shipped out this week.  That's all , no we
apologize, we will expedite the order, nothing.

conversations.body_text: Hi Shawn Corbett,     Please provide your order number.

Email was sent before I finished information.




Thank you
Shawn corbett
238 captain beam Blvd
Hampstead, NC 28443




On Wed, Jan 14, 2026, 1:14 AM service@simsonn.com

I received message saying it would be here before this Friday. Then today I
was asked by a message saying it would be here in the next 7 to 14 days.
And if I would wait for it. Wow this is crazy I have been wanted to
upgradey rig for a while so I saved money and was finally able to add , add
on to my pgresports sim rig. I even entered several additional races
thinking I would have all the upgrades by those races in time. I was
excited after reading about your products and was looking forward to
bringing them and results to my iracing community. I am really confused to
why I am getting different delivery times. I understand that sometimes
delivery gets delayed but to have different messages about when it will get
delivered is very disappointing. ... I really don't know what to say about
this . Hopefully your company will remedy this and this will have a decent
outcome.

Thank you.
Shawn corbett
Pgresports
Degapros #45, MMS #45, Iracing 2026 ovals.

Hi Shawn Corbett,  I am sorry for the inconvenience caused.  I have just checked your order status and found the current status is US New York Service Station,Albany,New York,US, Shipment loaded, prepare to send to next station.  on 2026-01-15​. I believe you will receive it soon. We apologize that due to the high volume of orders during the peak season, many orders have been delayed. The warehouse is also experiencing some disorganization, but we are already working to resolve this issue.

I understand high volume but my order was left in the warehouse and forgot
to ship until I sent a message guys??? That's different from high volume
orders and shipping...really.... Ok.  Thx for the update though...I see
where this is... ?


Shawn corbett....

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026, 10:50 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Shawn Corbett,  ​Your kind understanding and patience will be appreciated
